channel.title: [718] Interface Component Text
channel.description:
Hello, I'm currently using the sendIComponentText method to edit text of an interface server sided. My issue is that rather than replacing the text, it simply draws under the original interface text. I understand that I can fix this by editing the interface via cache but I was wondering if there's a method that I'm unaware of that will allow me to replace the initial text of an interface.
Here's an image of my issue: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZNWXV.png[/img]
